page_content: The page discusses an annual civil defense test alarm in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on tax deductions for gambling winnings in Switzerland.
The page provides a comprehensive FAQ about BE-Login, a platform for electronic tax filing in the Canton of Bern.
The page discusses the tax value of assets and liabilities as of December 31.
The page provides traffic advisories for football matches at the Stade de Suisse in Bern.
The page outlines the process for filing an objection to tax assessments in the Canton of Bern and mentions BE-Login for online submissions.
The page provides guidelines for the timing of business closures for tax purposes.
